extraction_metadata.notes: HIGH VALUE CASE: $800K+ estimated total loss. Unique tactics: Video call with scammer (Amelia), cultural affinity (Korea), gold futures trading specialization, UK tax extraction scheme. Platform claimed UK and US regulatory registration (false). Demo platform used to build confidence.

chain_of_thought.step_1_initial_contact: Amelia contacted victim on LinkedIn, expressed interest in Korean culture
chain_of_thought.step_2_platform_migration: Moved conversation to WhatsApp for extended trust building
chain_of_thought.step_3_trust_building: Video calls conducted, Amelia offered to be financial mentor
chain_of_thought.step_4_platform_introduction: Showed demo trading platform at Sundell-fx, promised profits
chain_of_thought.step_5_investment_escalation: Continuous pressure to transfer more money for larger profits
chain_of_thought.step_6_extraction_block: ID/bank verification demanded, then UK tax demand with 1-week deadline
